mapper.insert: insert into room_consumables (ID, ROOM_ID, NAME, PRICE, STATUS, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, MEMO) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update room_consumables

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
